reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 387/17: HYDRO ONE BRAMPTON NETWORKS INC. - VOTING SECURITIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: HYDRO ONE BRAMPTON NETWORKS INC. - VOTING SECURITIES

content.content: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to voting securities of Hydro One Brampton Networks Inc. mentioned in paragraph 2 of subsection 3 (1) of the Act.
content.raw_html: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to voting securities of Hydro One Brampton Networks Inc. mentioned in paragraph 2 of subsection 3 (1) of the Act.

content.content: 2. For the purposes of section 6 of the Act, the following amount in connection with the disposition of the assets is to be credited to the Trillium Trust promptly after this section comes into force: 1. $107,895,399, being 100 per cent of the designated proceeds of disposition, as determined under section 4 of the Act.
content.raw_html:
2. For the purposes of section 6 of the Act, the following amount in connection with the disposition of the assets is to be credited to the Trillium Trust promptly after this section comes into force:

1. $107,895,399, being 100 per cent of the designated proceeds of disposition, as determined under section 4 of the Act.

content.section: Designated proceeds of disposition — s. 4 of the Act
content.content: 3. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of section 4 of the Act, $1,384,553 is prescribed as the amount of costs incurred by the Crown in connection with the disposition.
content.raw_html: 3. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of section 4 of the Act, $1,384,553 is prescribed as the amount of costs incurred by the Crown in connection with the disposition.

content.section: Designated proceeds of disposition — s. 4 of the Act
content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Designated proceeds of disposition — s. 4 of the Act
